option.title: News Source Forums
option.explain: Only selected forums will be searched. (unspecify to disable)

option.title: News Posts Per Page
option.explain: The maximum number of articles to display on each page of the portal.

option.title: Max Summary Length
option.explain: Articles not containing a [prebreak], will be cut after this many characters.

option.title: Show Social Media Options
option.explain: Your social media settings can be individually enabled and disabled here.

option.title: Show History Navigation
option.explain:
If selected, a page navigation block will be displayed below your recent news block.
Previous pages are not cached and will naturally run slower than the first page.

option.title: Push Date out of Block
option.explain: If selected, the Month/Day div will be pushed slighly outside the block.

option.title: Use Sticky Threads
option.explain: If enabled, sticky threads will be pinned to the top regardless of promote date.
